name: Watching Tree Grow; Paint Dry
description:
A player watching a tree grow. Never ever had watching a tree grow been so exciting!

Controls:
Mouse - Click and drag objects to interact with them.
Water the tree using a bucket, and construct a well to refill your bucket! Don’t let the tree dry up, or it will die!

Art: Joel Ong
Programming: Daniel Chen
Music: Shayan Sharifnia and Harry Nguyen
